Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.os

Class OperatingSystem

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.os.OperatingSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Named
public class OperatingSystem extends Object implements Named
An abstraction of features of the underlying OS through Java interfaces. This object is a singleton, which can be retrieved with operatingSystem().

Identity

  • operatingSystemType()
  • processorArchitecture()
  • isMac()
  • isWindows()
